description.content:
Tests for the final 3 untested endpoints to achieve 100% API coverage

Endpoints covered:
1. PUT /v3/distribution/{id}/fields - Update signature fields
2. GET /v3/reports - Download frequency report
3. POST /v3/users/external/login - External authentication

Total: 3 endpoints
Impact: 85% â†’ 100% overall coverage
